constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: NEIPOL Name: SB1  South of the Borough
NEIGH Name: South of the Borough
SAC SAC Type: SPECIAL CONTROL OF ADVERTS
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP
SWFD Pipe Reference: GSPurpose: OTHERS
VALUER Type: VALUERSDescription: Housing Estates

decision_conditions: The proposed rear extension would extend beyond the rear wall of the original dwellinghouse by more than 3 metres in the case of the semi-detached dwellinghouse. Therefore the proposed development fails to comply with paragraph A1.(f) (i) of Class A of Part 1, Schedule 2 of theTown and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The proposed front porch would exceed 3 square metres. Therefore the proposed development fails to comply with paragraph D1.(b) of Class D of Part 1, Schedule 2 of theTown and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The proposed front porch would exceed 3 metres in height. Therefore the proposed development fails to comply with paragraph D1.(c) of Class D of Part 1, Schedule 2 of theTown and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
description: Erection of single storey rear extension, front porch and rear dormer roof extension, installation of 2 nox front rooflights to facilitate loft conversion
